name: IPOWER Energy Systems
overview: IPower makes power generating and energy management equipment that are responsive to customer demands in the areas of electricity and thermal energy (combined heat and power - CHP), and shaft power for irrigation pumps and other applications. These products cover the 20-365kW range as single units and over 1MW in integrated groupings and incorporate tech inologies developed by I Power in the areas of: high durability, low emissions, and low noise. IPower a customer-oriented organization with a strong R&D base directed at solutions to evolving requirements and technologies

external_links.title: I Power Energy Systems Acquires Distributed Power Company
